segments.text: Do you have a bf ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I had a bf before .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Why you say bf before ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We parted from each other last month .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Have you got a new one ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Mmmm , no . How about you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am single , I have no real of , only an E-gf , that is you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Haha , so you are my E-bf .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I like you . Do you agree to be my of ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Mmmm . .. OK , let's try to be .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Wow ! Blablablabla . . .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hey ! What is it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am flying like a bird .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: LL
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am so happy . I want to drink a cup of champagne .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have no champagne right now . How about this ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's OK , so I send you this .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Is it made of chocolate ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's my heart ; it's made of what you like .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , I will have a sweet dream .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Are you sleepy ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: A little bit . I have to go to sleep though I don't want to .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I do not want to see ur sleeping in the office .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thx.Bye for now . Kisssssssssss .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: C U here , honey .
segments.speaker: S1
